root.name: Adventures of Robinson Crusoe
root.description: OverviewAdventures of Robinson Crusoe is a hidden objects game developed by MagicIndie Softworks and published by Big Fish games and ak tronic Software Services for the PC and iPad platforms.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP/VistaCPU: 1.0 GHzRAM: 256 MBDirectX: 9.0Hard Drive: 99 MB
